alert.note: Alert for Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 2:37AM MST until November 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of a half an inch or less and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, especially Thursday morning. * WHERE...Gregory County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
